Patent Information.Patent Title: Antimicrobial peptide with increased antimicrobial activity and antimicrobial composition comprising the same as effective component
Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention relates to an antimicrobial peptide having an increased antimicrobial activity, a gene coding the antimicrobial peptide, a recombinant vector containing the gene, a host cell transformed with the recombinant vector, a method for producing the antimicrobial peptide by transforming the host cell with the recombinant vector, and an antimicrobial composition comprising the antimicrobial peptide with increased antimicrobial activity as an active ingredient.
